publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2535 Mr Kenneth Gibson: Condemnation of Female Circumcision—That the Parliament expresses concern about violence against women and children especially in the form of female genital mutilation (FGM); commends the research on FGM being carried out by the International Centre for Reproductive Health; declares FGM to be a violation of the human rights of girls and women as it represents an attempt to control women’s sexuality and subordinate their status in society; notes the existing legislation on this subject, and supports the continued promotion of women’s rights in an effort to stop FGM.

S1M-2535 Condemnation of Female Circumcision (lodged on 10 December 2001) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Tommy Sheridan*, Robert Brown*, Fergus Ewing*, Michael Matheson*, Ms Sandra White*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-2535 Condemnation of Female Circumcision (lodged on 10 December 2001) Roseanna Cunningham*, Tricia Marwick*, Dr Winnie Ewing*, Robin Harper*
S1M-2535 Condemnation of Female Circumcision (lodged on 10 December 2001) Colin Campbell*, Nora Radcliffe*

S1M-2535 Mr Kenneth Gibson: Condemnation of Female Circumcision-That the Parliament expresses concern about violence against women and children especially in the form of female genital mutilation (FGM); commends the research on FGM being carried out by the International Centre for Reproductive Health; declares FGM to be a violation of the human rights of girls and women as it represents an attempt to control women's sexuality and subordinate their status in society; notes the existing legislation on this subject, and supports the continued promotion of women's rights in an effort to stop FGM. Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Gil Paterson, Tommy Sheridan, Robert Brown, Fergus Ewing, Michael Matheson, Ms Sandra White, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Fiona McLeod, Roseanna Cunningham, Tricia Marwick, Dr Winnie Ewing, Robin Harper, Colin Campbell, Nora Radcliffe
S1M-2535 Condemnation of Female Circumcision (lodged on 10 December 2001) Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S1M-2535 Condemnation of Female Circumcision (lodged on 10 December 2001) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S1M-2535 Condemnation of Female Circumcision (lodged on 10 December 2001) Alex Neil*
S1M-2535 Condemnation of Female Circumcision (lodged on 10 December 2001) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2535 Condemnation of Female Circumcision (lodged on 10 December 2001) Linda Fabiani*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-2535 Condemnation of Female Circumcision (lodged on 10 December 2001) Dennis Canavan*
S1M-2535 Condemnation of Female Circumcision (lodged on 10 December 2001) Shona Robison*
S1M-2535 Condemnation of Female Circumcision (lodged on 10 December 2001) Donald Gorrie*
